meanings.definition: Growing or developing in a healthy or vigorous way.
meanings.sent1: The garden was flourishing with colorful flowers.
meanings.sent2: The plant looked flourishing under the bright sunlight.
meanings.sent3: The flourishing garden attracted many butterflies.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity was like a flourishing tree, branching out in all directions.
meanings.sent5: The flourishing meadow was a vibrant tapestry of life.

meanings.sent1: The business was flourishing after the new marketing strategy.
meanings.sent2: The community center was flourishing with new members.
meanings.sent3: The flourishing bakery had a line out the door.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a flourishing sun, spreading warmth to all around.
meanings.sent5: The flourishing economy brought prosperity to the town.

meanings.sent1: The movie was flourishing at the box office.
meanings.sent2: The band's new album was flourishing among music lovers.
meanings.sent3: The flourishing restaurant had a waiting list every night.
meanings.sent4: Her leadership was like a flourishing beacon, guiding others to success.
meanings.sent5: The flourishing artist's work was celebrated by critics and fans alike.
